DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The Psyche mission phase used for general testing purposes.
The Psyche mission phase used for preflight operations.
The Psyche mission phase used for ATLO.
The Psyche mission phase used for spacecraft launch.
The Psyche mission phase used for the initial checkout (ICO), lasting 100 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for the cruise 1 period, lasting 26 months.
The Psyche mission phase used for the Mars gravity assist, lasting 62 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for the cruise 2 period, lasting 36 months.
The Psyche mission phase used for the approach to 16 Psyche, last 100 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for the entire orbital operations period, lasting 26 months.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit A operations, lasting 56 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit B1 operations, lasting 92 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit B2 operations, lasting 100 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit C operations, lasting 100 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit D operations, lasting 100 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit transfer A-to-B1, lasting 17 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit transfer B1-to-D, lasting 98 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit transfer D-to-C, lasting 90 days.
The Psyche mission phase used for orbit transfer C-to-B2, lasting 23 days.

DD_Attribute.name: orbit_number
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the orbit number during orbital operations.

DD_Attribute.name: release_number
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the release number when a product was published.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_start
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the observation spacecraft clock start (SCLK) recorded.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: [p/]dddddddddd[.fffffffff] - The spacecraft clock value is an integer with no more than 10 digits, optionally preceded by a clock partition number and forward slash, and optionally followed by a fractional value. If the fractional value is present, it must be separated from the whole number by a period, and may have up to 9 digits. If a partition number and slash are not present, then the attribute spacecraft_clock_partition must be used.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_stop
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the observation spacecraft clock stop (SCLK) recorded.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: [p/]dddddddddd[.fffffffff] - The spacecraft clock value is an integer with no more than 10 digits, optionally preceded by a clock partition number and forward slash, and optionally followed by a fractional value. If the fractional value is present, it must be separated from the whole number by a period, and may have up to 9 digits. If a partition number and slash are not present, then the attribute spacecraft_clock_partition must be used.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_start_corrected
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the observation spacecraft clock start (SCLK) recorded, corrected for any clock updates.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: [p/]dddddddddd[.fffffffff] - The spacecraft clock value is an integer with no more than 10 digits, optionally preceded by a clock partition number and forward slash, and optionally followed by a fractional value. If the fractional value is present, it must be separated from the whole number by a period, and may have up to 9 digits. If a partition number and slash are not present, then the attribute spacecraft_clock_partition must be used.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_stop_corrected
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the observation spacecraft clock stop (SCLK) recorded, corrected for an clock updates.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: [p/]dddddddddd[.fffffffff] - The spacecraft clock value is an integer with no more than 10 digits, optionally preceded by a clock partition number and forward slash, and optionally followed by a fractional value. If the fractional value is present, it must be separated from the whole number by a period, and may have up to 9 digits. If a partition number and slash are not present, then the attribute spacecraft_clock_partition must be used.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_partition
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the spacecraft clock partition, tracking any clock resets.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_fsw_dictionary_version
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the version of the spacecraft fsw dictionary in use.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Version 5.4.2.1 of the Psyche FSW dictionary.
Version 5.4.2.2 of the Psyche FSW dictionary.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_active_flight_computer
DD_Attribute.definition: This value denotes the spacecraft pce active and in use.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The Psyche spacecraft active pce A.
The Psyche spacecraft active pce B.

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_test: if ( (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition) or (contains(psyche:spacecraft_clock_start, '/')) or ( (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition)) and (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_start)) ) ) then true() else false()
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: psyche:error:sclk_rule_0: If psyche:spacecraft_clock_start is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the clock partition must be given by psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition.
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_description: If the spacecraft_clock_start is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the partition number must be given by spacecraft_clock_partition

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_test: if ( (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition) or (contains(psyche:spacecraft_clock_stop, '/')) or ( (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition)) and (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_stop)) ) ) then true() else false()
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: psyche:error:sclk_rule_1: If psyche:spacecraft_clock_stop is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the clock partition must be given by psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition.
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_description: If the spacecraft_clock_stop is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the partition number must be given by spacecraft_clock_partition

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_test: if ( (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition) or (contains(psyche:spacecraft_clock_start_corrected, '/')) or ( (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition)) and (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_start_corrected)) ) ) then true() else false()
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: psyche:error:sclk_rule_2: If psyche:spacecraft_clock_start_corrected is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the clock partition must be given by psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition.
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_description: If the spacecraft_clock_start_corrected is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the partition number must be given by spacecraft_clock_partition

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_test: if ( (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition) or (contains(psyche:spacecraft_clock_stop_corrected, '/')) or ( (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition)) and (not (psyche:spacecraft_clock_stop_corrected)) ) ) then true() else false()
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: psyche:error:sclk_rule_3: If psyche:spacecraft_clock_stop_corrected is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the clock partition must be given by psyche:spacecraft_clock_partition.
DD_Rule_Statement.rule_description: If the spacecraft_clock_stop_sorrected is present, it must begin with a partition number followed by a forward slash, or the partition number must be given by spacecraft_clock_partition
